name: Vacuum pack (stomach)
description: A vacuum pack of plastic packaging containing the stomach. It can be opened and taken out. For the time being only packing, parasites may remain.

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: Vacuum pack (big stomach)
description: A vacuum pack of plastic packaging with a large stomach. It can be opened and taken out. For the time being only packing, parasites may remain.

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: Vacuum pack (offal)
description: Vacuum pack of plastic packaging containing offal. It can be opened and taken out. For the time being only packing, parasites may remain.

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: Vacuum pack (human stomach)
description: A vacuum pack of plastic packaging containing human stomach. I can open and take it out. For the time being only packing, parasite may remain

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: Vacuum pack (human corpse)
description: A vacuum pack of plastic packaging containing human corpses. I can open it and take it out.

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: Burrito (vacuum packed)
description: It is a burrito that enables long-term storage by vacuum packaging. It can be taken out by opening it.

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

name: TV dinner (vacuum packed)
description: It is a TV dinner that enables long-term storage by vacuum packaging. It can be taken out by opening it.

use_action.msg: You open the vacuum pack, exposing it to the atmosphere.

description: A small, open plastic bag.  Essentially trash.
